sentence: Hice is challenging Secretary of State Brad Raffensperger, who also has Trumps support, as does another GOP-er with a long history of violence against women: Herschel Walker for Senate.

title: On Jan. 6 Vernon Jones switched parties. Trump's endorsing him for a Congressional seat in Georgia

sentence: Staples has also made two trips to Trumps Mar-a-Lago resort in Florida, once with U.S. Senate candidate Herschel Walker and another with conservative activist Charlie Kirk.

title: Now solidly Republican, primary likely to decide the next 6th District representative
